## endSlotTemplate variable

The template for the end element. For use with [StartEnd](./fast-foundation.startend.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
endSlotTemplate: (context: ElementDefinitionContext, definition: EndOptions) => ViewTemplate<StartEnd>
```
